sentences.english: The calculus and stains have to be removed before your gums can become healthy.
sentences.chinese: 牙石和污垢得先清除掉，然後牙齦纔會變得健康。

sentences.english: Dirt and coke thing to waste gas by the combustion chamber and a combustion emissions vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 污垢及積碳物將經燃燒室燃燒後與廢氣一道排出車外。

sentences.english: Soil adhesion may be reduced even if water cannot readily permeate the soil layer.
sentences.chinese: 即使水不易進入污垢內層，也能降低污垢的吸附作用。

sentences.english: Soil adhesion may be reduced even if water cannot readily permeate the soil layer.
sentences.chinese: 即使水不易進入污垢內層，也能降低污垢的吸附作用。

sentences.english: To directly spray the stain with a few minutes, then rinse.
sentences.chinese: 將本品直接噴在污垢處，數分鐘後，再用清水沖洗。

sentences.english: Keep dirt out to minimize cleaning and related expenses.
sentences.chinese: 清除污垢以最大限度減少清潔和相關的花費。

sentences.english: TOI wants to keep readers amused and not to worry about the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 印度時報想要保持娛樂讀者，並不擔心污垢。

sentences.english: A novel prediction approach based on multi-model combination for condenser fouling is proposed .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於多模型組合的冷凝器污垢預測新方法。

sentences.english: Process water monitoring to reduce biofouling build up.
sentences.chinese: 工藝用水監測，減少生物污垢生長沉積。

sentences.english: Vaccuum surface dirt from the seats, as well, with special attention to the crumb-collecting crevices.
sentences.chinese: 除去座椅表面的污垢，同時特別注意積灰塵的縫。

sentences.english: Kangchun’s face was smeared with dirt and he carried a flashlight suspended from his neck with a piece of twine.
sentences.chinese: 康晨的臉上沾滿了污垢，脖子上用繩子掛着一個電筒。

sentences.english: Completely cleans any makeup and dirt, makes our skins as soft as silk.
sentences.chinese: 徹底清除彩妝及污垢，使肌膚幼滑如絲。

sentences.english: After their work on the car their hands were besmeared with dirt.
sentences.chinese: 修完汽車後，他們手上沾滿了污垢。

sentences.english: It is pure and unstained by sin.
She cleaned the dirt from her finger-nails.

definition: tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
